title: The Misery of Doing Our Own Taxes: Why You Should Consider Facet
subtitle: Discover how Facet can simplify your tax process and integrate planning throughout the year.
content:
The Misery of Doing Our Own Taxes: Why You Should Consider Facet

Nothing unites this country quite like the misery of doing our own taxes. It’s the Super Bowl of stress, except we all lose, and it looks the same in every house: half-empty coffee mug, 47 browser tabs open, debating whether your dog’s Instagram page qualifies as a small business.

The Average Tax Struggle

On average, you’re spending 13 hours a year voluntarily submitting to this torture, arguing with some random tax app about whether a stapler counts as a business expense.

Facet: A Better Solution

With Facet, taxes are no longer a once-a-year scramble. They’re baked into your financial plan year-round. Whether it’s a Roth conversion or stock sale, these actions are planned out and accounted for before they turn into an expensive April surprise.

No More Guesswork

Instead of hoping you magically clicked all the right buttons on your own, you can either DIY file online with a pro reviewing your work, or let a certified tax professional take it all off your plate, depending on which plan works for you.

Conclusion

Go to facet.com/tyler today, and let their partnered tax team do the heavy lifting for you.
